Standard.Name: The Treasure of Hassan Ben Sahid 1.1.1.2.2

English.Text: The map appears worthless without the annotations. "We could have just remained in that wonderful old square under that marvellous arched gate and sipped our coffee on this beautiful sunny day. Instead we have sweat our suspenders off on this childish treasure hunt! We have seen the whole city, and yet we have seen absolutely nothing at all!" So much for relaxing shore leave...
